headline: Gen Announces Board Transitions, Welcomes John Chrystal as Peter Feld Departs
summary: Gen Digital Inc. (NASDAQ: GEN), a global leader dedicated to powering Digital Freedom, today announced the departure of Peter Feld from its Board of Directors, following his impactful tenure that began in 2018. With this departure, Gen welcomes John Chrystal, former member of MoneyLion's Board of Directors, who joins the Gen Board as the Company accelerates its innovation and focus on financial wellness.
